mapper.insert: insert into tbl_student (sname, sid, spw, semail) values (#{sname}, #{sid}, #{spw}, #{semail})
mapper.update: update tbl_student set sname = #{sname}, spw = #{spw}, semail = #{semail} where sid = #{sid}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_student order by sname
